name: Mini Invaders (crisschiaff)
description:
=== PLAY THIS ON MOBILE ===

It’s been a great journey to infinity and beyond! 🚀

Thanks to Creative Core and Junior Programmer pathways from Unity, I’ve been able to ideate and create my first vertically-scrolling space shooter.

What an exciting ride! 🤩

After some effort the browser version of my space shooter is now available.
Grab you phone and play a game! Your feedback in the comments will be appreciated 😁

Link on Behance project: https://www.behance.net/gallery/162605901/Mini-Invaders
